Buffalo.Parkside Candy Shoppe and Factory: Parkside Candy Shoppe and Factory is a historic commercial and industrial complex located in the University Heights neighborhood of Buffalo, Erie County, New York. It consists of a two-story brick and stone commercial Candy Shoppe building (1925-1927), with an attached two-story brick and tile daylight factory building, erected in two stages (1925-1927; 1928). Also on the property is a contributing one-story, three-bay frame garage (1928).
